name: "Marechaussee Hunter: Judgment Day" Character Album
desc: A book that commemorates the participants in this game of "Marechaussee Hunter: Judgment Day." For both players and Game Master, it is full of memories of your adventures together. "And so shall I never despair"... Perhaps this exhortation holds a deeper meaning for the one who played the Marechaussee Hunter?

value.text:
Clorinde's Story Quest
Rapperia Chapter: Act I - Silent Night
Quest - Vanquishing Phantoms

desc.text:
Character Name: Clorinde
Character Identity: "Game Master" of the Tabletop Troupe

Character Name: "Navia"
Character Identity: Marechaussee Hunter
Background:
An optimistic, kind-hearted Marechaussee Hunter who also happens to be a shrewd merchant. She has a quick wit and is exceptionally eloquent.
Character Skills: "Persuasion," "Investigation," "Summon"

Character Name: "Furina"
Character Identity: Marechaussee Hunter
Background:
A Marechaussee Hunter with a beautiful singing voice and a deep grounding in the arts, capable of moving people to their very core through the power of performance. Deep down, she yearns that someday she might become a performing artist in a more peaceful era.
Character Skills: "Art," "Performance," "Summon"

Character Name: "Lyney"
Character Identity: Marechaussee Hunter
Background:
The adopted son of a Marechaussee Hunter. His experience of roaming the streets as a child has taught him some key survival skills.
Character Skills: "Stealth," "Sleight of Hand," "Summon"

Character Name: "Traveler"
Character Identity: Marechaussee Hunter
Background:
A kind, upstanding Marechaussee Hunter. You introduce yourself to your companions with the following words: "I've been studying medicine ever since I was a child. I want to do my part to eradicate these monsters and use what I've learned to heal others."
Character Skills: "Medicine," "Insight," "Summon"

Character Name: "Traveler"
Character Identity: Marechaussee Hunter
Background:
A kind, upstanding Marechaussee Hunter. You introduce yourself to your companions with the following words: "I've been studying the culinary arts since I was a child. I hope my delicious food can help boost people's spirits."
Character Skills: "Cooking," "Insight," "Summon"

Character Name: "Paimon"
Character Identity: Marechaussee Hunter's Good Friend
Background:
Follows the Marechaussee Hunter Traveler around in the capacity of best friend and guide.
